sub_title: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter
summary:
As a political analyst and advocacy expert, I support your organisation in their strategic positioning towards political policy makers and partnering with colleague organisation. As Strategic Advisor I have 23 years of experience around the world. My services and expertise multiply the results and impact of your organisation. 

Over the years I have gained specific expertise in the policies and the financing of SDG#6. On the issue of water and sanitation I advised donor governments, International Financial Institutions and impact investors, and utilities, international NGOs

My services are
•	I make political and policy analyses to identify opportunities for your organisation;
•	I make stakeholder and power analyses to identify your partners to work with;
•	I facilitate strategic workshops to develop new projects and partnerships for your organisation;
•	I work out propositions to pitch your unique proposition to political policy makers, potential partners and attract external resources;
•	I build your partnership and manage your project;
•	I train and coach you to capacitate you in lobby and advocacy 

My services are always tailor made to your needs and context, and are carried out in close cooperation with you.

Antoon Blokland has worked for around 70 clients since 2007. Among the clients are: 
•	Civil society organisations: like WaterAID, Oxfam, World Wildlife Fund, ONE, SACAU, SIMAVI and Aqua4All. 
•	Private companies: Dutch Water Utilities, Palladium, Triple Jump and many SME’s. 
•	International Financial Institutions: like the European Investment Bank, FMO, WorldBank, Dutch Good Growth Fund. 
•	Donor/Governments: like DGIS, European Commission, Finish Government, Government of Ghana, Government of Kenya. 
•	Knowledge institutions: like the OECD, European Policy Centre, ECDPM, KIT.

Antoon Blokland  advised and capacitated organisations in lobby and advocacy in:
•	Europe: The Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, Finland, Sweden, France, Spain, Italy, Denmark, Po-land
•	Americas: United States of America, Haiti, Colombia, Bolivia, Peru
•	Africa: Morocco, Mali, Senegal, Ghana, Mauretania, Burkina Faso, Ethiopia, Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda, Zambia, South Africa, Namibia, Botswana, Mozambique, Rwanda, 
•	Asia: India, Indonesia, Philippines, Cambodia, Bangladesh, Vietnam, Myanmar, Afghanistan, Laos

projects.title: WaterWorX Strategic Investment Support

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Decentralised Sustainable Access to Energy
projects.description: Antoon Blokland advised an European – African network of decentralised sustainable energy providers in Africa on their influencing strategy towards the European Commission. And supported the network on the implementation of the influencing strategy to make decentralised sustainable energy part of the development cooperation policy and programme 2021 – 2027.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Operational Efficiency Investment Fund
projects.description: Antoon Blokland develops an investment fund to mobilise finance from impact investors, and provide investment finance to utilities for small investments in operational efficiency. Antoon Blokland develops business cases, and assess the investment ability of impact investors.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: European Commission WOP Programme
projects.description: On behalf of the European Commission and European Utilities from 8 European Member states work out a description and outline of the European Commission WOP Programme. A 7m Euro programme to co finance the Water Operator Partnerships of European Utilities. The programme will start in January 2020 and run till 2024.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Impact Investors in water
projects.description: Assess the ability of Impact Investors to finance water projects in developing countries and develop a WaterWorX portfolio of investment projects that can meet the financial conditions of the impact inves-tors, and allocate new and additional finance for SDG#6.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Platform of European Utilities
projects.description: Antoon Blokland build and facilitated an ad hoc platform of European Utilities active in development cooperation projects. The platform promotes the Water Operator Partnership as a means to meet the SDG#6, and advocate for a supportive policies and financial instruments of the European Commission and European Member States, to finance Water Operator Partnerships of European Utilities.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: 1% Solidarity Mechanism and Water Operator Partnerships
projects.description: Antoon Blokland advised and supported European Utilities from Finland, Germany, France in the promo-tion of the 1% solidarity mechanism and the Water Operator Partnership model towards their national government.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Cooperation agreements with Development Financial Institutions
projects.description: Assess the ability of DFIs (WorldBank, Asian Development Bank, African Development Bank, RVO, FMO, European Investment Bank) to finance water projects in developing countries and develop cooperation agreements between DFIs, donors and utilities to enable the financing of Water Operator Partnerships.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Capacity Workshops on influencing
projects.description:
4 day workshops to improve the organisational capacities and staff capacities to develop an influencing strategy and implement the strategy through influencing activities. With these workshops Antoon Blok-land capacitated NGOs, private sector, think thanks, financial institutions, farmer unions in influencing skills.  

Antoon Blokland  advised and capacitated organisations in lobby and advocacy in:
•	Europe: The Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, Finland, Sweden, France, Spain, Italy, Denmark, Po-land
•	Americas: United States of America, Haiti, Colombia, Bolivia, Peru
•	Africa: Morocco, Mali, Senegal, Ghana, Mauretania, Burkina Faso, Ethiopia, Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda, Zambia, South Africa, Namibia, Botswana, Mozambique, Rwanda, 
•	Asia: India, Indonesia, Philippines, Cambodia, Bangladesh, Vietnam, Myanmar, Afghanistan, Laos

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Political and Policy Monitoring
projects.description: Antoon Blokland daily monitors the Dutch policy developments and political debate in the field of For-eign Affairs, Development Cooperation, Trade, Investments and Business Environment. We weekly inform 40 clients on the policy developments (CSOs, companies, branch organisations, financial institu-tions), advise them tailor made on how to advocate in reaction to these developments and develop and carry out ad hoc advocacy activities (network meetings, policy letters, expert meetings, opinion in the media etc.) on behalf of these clients towards policy makers.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Influencing strategies of Hydropower dams
projects.description: Antoon Blokland advised, trained and support the staff of national offices in Asia and Africa of an Inter-national NGO on their influencing strategy around hydropower dams in free flowing rivers in relation to climate change. The output was capacitated staff to develop and implement a context specific strategy to influence the policies, design, investment and building of these Hydropower dams.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: SME Impact Investments Fund
projects.description: Antoon Blokland co-created 3 social impact investments funds. All of these 3 funds invest into SMEs in developing countries and provide technical assistance to the SMEs alongside the investment. Antoon Blokland co designed the business case of the fund and developed a proposition towards financiers to acquire additional investment finance and grant finance, for both technical assistance and first loss.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: WaterWorX Investment Strategic Advise
projects.description: Antoon Blokland developed and advised an investment strategy for the WaterWorX programme. WaterWorX is a partner-ship between DGIS and the 10 Dutch Water companies around institutional strengthening of water utili-ties, and aims to connect 10m people to water in developing countries by 2030. Part of the programme roadmap to connect 10m people is to mobilise and leverage investment finance from Development Financial Institutions (DFIs) and Impact Investors. Antoon Blokland did a policy and stakeholder analyses around SDG6 finance, developed an investment strategy and advise the WaterWorX partnership.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Climate Fund
projects.description: Antoon Blokland advised a consortium of partners on their fund management proposal to the Dutch Climate Fund tender, and in preparation to this organised the exchange of the consortium with donor to have a better understanding of the Climate Fund policy.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Employability, Job Creation and Private Sector Development
projects.description: Antoon Blokland build a consortium of complementary partners to work around job creation through private sector development and employability of youth. The consortium developed programme pro-posals and have programme contracts with DGIS, the European Commission and European Investment Bank.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: European Investment Bank Water Sector Trust Fund
projects.description: Antoon Blokland build and represent a coalition of a water utility, water engineering consultancy and Water NGOs towards the European Investment Bank. The coalition put forward a portfolio of water infrastructure investment proposals to be financed by the European Investment Bank. Out of this the EIB and Antoon Blokland together developed the EIB Water Sector Trust Fund. Antoon Blokland devel-oped the fund description, the fund manager profile and acquired contributions of EU member states and European Commission to finance the Water Sector Trust Fund.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Green Utility Network
projects.description: Antoon Blokland build a coalition of water utilities and a natural resource management think tank. To-gether they developed and launched a Green Utility Network. The network develop and design climate resilient investment proposals in water infrastructure in development countries. These green infrastruc-ture investment projects are put forward to the available adaptation finance, f.e. of the Green Climate Fund, European Investment Bank, Asian Development Bank.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

projects.title: Indonesia Platform
projects.description: Antoon Blokland developed and facilitates a strategic cooperation of 11 Dutch and Indonesian CSOs and Companies. These are all active in social business development and social Business. The objective of the platform is to have a structural political dialogue with Indonesian, Dutch and European policy makers and influence the social business environment and government regulations.

contributors.headline: Senior Political Advisor / Expert Finance of Water and Sanitation / Cycling Business Innovator in East Africa / The Cycling Water Reporter

profile_positions.description: Based on political monitoring and policy analyses I advise my clients on their strategic positioning and develop campaigns towards governments, donors, investors and other policy actors in the field of Development Cooperation in Africa and Asia. Often I do the lobby and campaign work on behalf of my client, or train the staff to become better lobbyist, and take up de lobby work and campsign themselves.
profile_positions.title: Senior Political Advisor and Lobbyists in Development Cooperation

profile_positions.description: I have been mobilising finance for Water, Sanitation and Climate Adaptation in Africa and Asia. To meet the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris Climate Goals we have to mobilise sufficient financial means - taxes, grants, investment loans and private capital, and develop a pipeline of feasible projects that can absorb those financial means. I have worked on both, and developed several investment funds and financing instruments to bring the mobilised finance to the investment projects.
profile_positions.title: Expert in Finance of Water, Sanitation, Climate Adaptation in Asia and Africa

profile_positions.description: During my cycling tours through East Africa and Asia I got to know many cyclist, cycling organisations and cycling businesses. From them I heard the challenges they face with cycling and their bicycles, and I experienced these challenges myself by cycling around. I am supporting some cyclists and cycling entrepreneurs with expertise and finance to tackle the challenges. And I am establishing a 'Cycling Innovation Hub' in Nairobi to support the Cycling Sector and Industry in Kenya with expertise, finance, innovations and cooperation.
profile_positions.title: Business Innovator and Developer in the Cycling Business in East Africa

profile_positions.description: The year 2022, I cycled through East Africa and Asia, along the water projects I worked for the past 15 years. By make video's of my project visit I gave insights and my view on the successes and challenges of achieving #waterforall. At most of the projects I visited, we  organised cycling events with the local cycling club to campaign and raise awareness.
profile_positions.title: The Cycling Water Reporter

profile_positions.description:
Together with Proportion I develop value propositions for my clients. Based on the value and track record of an organisation we develop new value propositions. This can be new programme proposals or business propositions. With the client we pitch the value proposition to financiers to acquire programme finance or start up capital. 

The human-centered design approach of Proportion and the political policy and investment finance approach of Antoon Blokland are complementary to develop value propositions, with proven success.

Value Propositions have been developed for
Regional office of ICCO South East Asia, 
Regional office of ICCO West Africa, 
ICCO Bangladesh, 
Manqa Healthy Food, ICCO Bolivia and Colombia,
Football for Water in Kenya and Ghana, Programme proposal
Agri Business Booster, SME Impact Investment Fund
VSO, Randstad, Palladium - Challenge Fund Management
EMEA, 
Prisma East Africa,
profile_positions.title: Value Proposition Developer

profile_positions.description:
BBO is an advising agency that aims to bridge people and politics by creating political access and enabling political influence. As Senior Political Advisor Antoon Blokland advised and supported civil society organisations, public-private partnerships, companies and knowledge platforms around the world on developing effective lobby strategies on national and international policy matters. 

Antoon Blokland provided his clients: 
Political monitoring and Policy Analyses;
Strategic Positioning Advise
Network Building and 
Coaching and Training
profile_positions.title: Senior Political Advisor -Founders and Owner

profile_positions.description: Advocate for the CNV Labour Union Members, and manager of the international relations of the national Dutch Labour Union CNV
profile_positions.title: Director CNV International

profile_positions.description: Advocating on behalf of the young members of Dutch Labour Union CNV towards politicians and policy makers.
profile_positions.title: President CNV Youth
